channel.title: SevenAtSevenPolitics
channel.description: This is a randomly ordered feed of the most recent entries from SevenAtSevenPolitics, skipping any feeds with errors.

item.title: Texas judge orders Attorney General Ken Paxton's divorce records unsealed amid heated Senate primary

item.title: Conservatives need to embrace ‘fusion’ of populism, top leader says, calling AmFest scenes ‘encouraging’
item.description: Heritage Foundation leader says conservative movement has 'great hope' despite recent losses, urging embrace of populism and immigration policy focus.

item.title: A Stained Glass Christmas, from Chartres to Baltimore’s Gilded Age
item.description: ‘Like painting in air’ with colored light, John La Farge said of his church glass art.

item.title: A photo with Trump in it appears to have been removed from the partial Epstein files the Justice Department released
item.description: "This photo, file 468, from the Epstein files that includes Donald Trump has apparently now been removed from the DOJ release."

item.title: Meet Minnesota's fraud ‘mastermind’ accused of playing ‘God,' wielding ‘fake' racism claims in Somali scandal
item.description: Aimee Bock allegedly masterminded Minnesota's $250 million Feeding Our Future fraud. One witness testified she was "a God" who controlled meal sites.

item.title: Strengthening the Military Chaplain Corps Is a Win for Religious Liberty
item.description: A government institution charged with defending the Constitution shouldn’t marginalize religion itself. At long last, it won’t.

item.title: ’Tis the Season for Trimming Travel Regulations
item.description: The best gift to fliers this holiday season would be to let the competitive airline marketplace do its thing.

item.title: Trump Has No Authority to Categorize Fentanyl as a Weapon of Mass Destruction
item.description: Common sense tells us that narcotic drugs are different from WMD. As one would expect, these differences are reflected in law.

item.title: Inside Stefanik’s exit and how the Trump endorsement that never came was 'biggest piece' of the 'puzzle'

item.title: 5 questions about Trump's North Carolina rally and economic agenda
item.description: Trump focused on economic achievements, including falling drug prices, plans to target health insurance companies, and job creation.

item.title: How the ‘Reddit Detective Agency’ and surveillance technology helped find the suspect in the deadly Brown University shooting

item.title: OpenAI vs. Apple? Sam Altman is setting his sights on winning what could be an even higher-stakes AI battle
item.description: Altman recruited iPhone designer Jony Ive to OpenAI this May, and Ive has said the company’s secret device could be ready in the next two years.

item.title: 2028 lines being drawn among conservatives as two top names emerge among AmericaFest activists
item.description: AmericaFest attendees predict a 2028 presidential showdown between JD Vance and Josh Shapiro, potentially reshaping Rust Belt politics for the future.

item.title: China’s Alarming Latin America Strategy
item.description: A new paper reveals the essence of Beijing’s worldview: the entire world is one chessboard, and the Taiwan question is at its center.

item.title: Chaplains Punished For Mentioning Jesus Cheer Hegseth’s Return To God-Focused Ministry
item.description: The chaplain brings God to the fight, offering something bigger for the soldier to hold on to. It is something an atheist can't offer.
